title: Saiyin is trying to flee!
text:
Before performing her Advance to disengage, Rakkir uses his 'Dagger Attack' to inflict a Parting Blow. 'Dagger Attack' has a reach of 1. Any character fleeing from the hexes in red are susceptible to Rakkir's Parting Blow.

Rakkir has 3 dice to roll to perform his Parting Blow.

7 (MEL) - 5 (AGI) +1 = 3 Dice

Resolve the damage before performing the Advance .
